hymn.title: O how great His salvation
hymn.chords: | C - G7 - | C - F/C - | C - G - | C - G/B - | Am - C/G - | F - F/A - | C - Am - | Dm7 - G7 - | C - G7 - | C - G7/D - | C/E - G/B - | C - G - | Am - C/E - | F - F/A - | C - C/E - | Dm7 - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: O how great His sal -- va -- tion! O how great His sal -- va -- tion! O how great His sal -- va -- tion! Je -- sus saves me now! Je -- sus breaks ev -- ery fet -- ter! Je -- sus breaks ev -- ery fet -- ter! Je -- sus breaks ev -- ery fet -- ter! Je -- sus sets me free!

lyrics.stanza: O how great His salvation! O how great His salvation! O how great His salvation! Jesus saves me now!
Jesus breaks every fetter! Jesus breaks every fetter! Jesus breaks every fetter! Jesus sets me free!
All my sins are forgiven! All my fetters are riven! I enjoy peace of heaven! Jesus saves me now!
Neither sin nor temptation, Neither Satan's vexation, Nor the world's best elation Can enslave me now!
I will sing Hallelujah! I will sing Hallelujah! I will sing Hallelujah! Jesus saves me now!
